prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Bass, Piano, Guitar, but without Pipe.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Drums, Bass, Piano, and Guitar, but no Pipe.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Drums, Bass, Piano, and Guitar, omitting the Pipe.

Style 3:
The instruments used in this song are Drums, Bass, Piano, and Guitar, Pipe excluded.
